hive_text_custom.text: My favorite cuisine has to be Hawaiian food. I grew up eating Hawaiian food so every
we had Hawaiian food, so now when I eat Hawaiian food, it always

Traditional Hawaiian food is usually cooked under the ground in a hole with hot rocks and it cooks for maybe six hours or seven hours and when you take it out, it's very salty because we use a lot of salt and it tastes really good ... usually meat ... usually pork and other vegetables like taro and potato.
So then what's your favorite Hawaiian dish?
My favorite Hawaiian dish is called Lao-Lao. It's pork or fish wrapped in leaves and put inside the
oven and it's very salty and very good.
So the flavor is just salt?
The flavor is salt and also the leaf flavor that it's
What's your favorite dessert or junk food?
My favorite dessert has to be cake and ice-cream together. I love to eat cake and ice-cream together.
My favorite ice-cream flavor is strawberry, and I like to eat that with chocolate cake.
Mm, sounds good. Do you like vegetables?
Not so much. I don't like to eat vegetables but I can eat them if somebody cooks them for me.
My favorite vegetable ... I don't have a favorite vegetable but I can eat vegetables like asparagus, broccoli, carrots. Those types of things.
Do you eat your vegetables raw ... like salad ... or do you prefer them cooked?

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1) Growing up Ron ate Hawaiian food _____ .
2) Traditional Hawaiian food cooks for _____ 5 hours.
4) He talks about his favorite ____ flavor.
